The sun's divine power dispels any magical darkness.Doesn't affect creatures that have total cover from you.

On Save: Targets still take half damage. 9m CON Save

While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.
